name: Rescue Baby Yoda
description:
Summary: 

Rescue baby Yoda who is stuck on a base behind a bunch of heavy boxes. Use the 2 power ups that come along your way to defeat the enemies and make those heavy boxes float. Guide baby Yoda to the finish line.  REMEMBER YOU ONLY HAVE 120 SECONDS so act fast but don't get caught.

How to play:

  1. Find baby Yoda and GUIDE yoda to the place where you started from .
  2. IF YOU GET TO FAR AWAY BABY YODA WILL STOP FOLLOWING.
  3. Left click to shoot.
  4. Use your mouse to look around.
  5. WASD to move.
  6. Purple discs damages enemies.
  7. Green discs makes them float.
